title: #344: Devil In Disguise: Honoring the Victims and Deconstructing a Serial Rapist/Killer' - Part 3
description:
We continue our analysis of a serial killer who raped and murdered at least 33 young men and boys. Jim points out how in this case and others, law enforcement assumed that all sex between gay men is consensual, and as a result they often did not take seriously reports of rape.  If they had, they might have stopped JG sooner when victims came forward accusing him of rape. Laura explains why it is so important not to give sensationalistic monikers to these offenders and why at Real Crime Profile we do our best to not name them. Lisa asks about the post execution conspiracy theory posited by some, that JG was part of a large child sex trafficking ring. 

#DevilinDiguise

#Peacock

#VictimsMatter #SerialKiller #Profiling #BehavioralAnalysis

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
